column4: Does anyone have a idea why in the message-indicator neither pidgin nor emails through thunderbird show up?
What could be broken and how can I research what is?
the new indicator message use some ondemand stuff, for with the pidgin indicator plugin is not prepared; not idea about thinderbird
it usually should go blue when  a new email arrives but it does not and it doesn't show the history like in 12.04;
